titleInfo.title: ‘PLAN of the DEFENSIBLE BARRACK or MILITARY POST intended for the Table Land immediately overlooking The Raving or Valey of the Wells. ADEN’ and ‘BATTERY and DEFENCES on SEERA MOLE, ADEN’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on paperDimensions:764 x 1326 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Compiled and signed by a Special Committee on the Aden Defences formed of Engineers Lieutenant Colonel C.W. Grant and Major Artillery William Jacob, Bombay 23rd April 1844. Includes plans and corresponding longitudinal sections and elevations showing proposed barracks with yard, Barrier Gate and towers with embrasure and traversing gun on a terrace. Lettered for reference with measurements reported.Labels:On verso, upper right:‘Duplicate ADEN Defences on Seera Mole and Defensible Barrack. No. 36’.
